author: pmcmahan
msg: GERONIMO-2670 Update plugin catalog for geronimo 2.0 to include 2.0-SNAPSHOT
as a compatible version.  This will allow the 2.0 server in trunk to be able
to use the plugin catalog at http://geronimo.apache.org/plugins/geronimo-2.0

author: kstam
msg: JUDDI-90: Embedded mode excution. Part-I: Moving the Database class so that it can be used for to connect to a database directly using straight jdbc.
This feature is needed to allow to juddi in embedded mode (outside of a j2ee container).
For stress/high load situations we will need to add connection pooling.

author: wrowe
msg: Belated tag the released installer as built
